attributes.text: The Progressive object to which we are being joined.

The name by which the data model will reference this renderer. This is important to know in order to access the appropriate member of the {@link qx.ui.progressive.State}‘s renderer array. That array is accessed from the renderer by state.getRendererData()[element.renderer] where element.renderer will be the name provided here.
Data relevant to the current rendering session.

An object containing at least the following members:

renderer
The name of a renderer. That name is used by {@link qx.ui.progressive.Progressive} to select the renderer to be used to render this element. The name should match one provided to {@link qx.ui.progressive.Progressive#addRenderer}.
data
The data to be passed to the renderer. The data may be of any type that the renderer knows how to render.
Render the provided element in the renderer’s unique way.
